snippet.title: Urban Jungle | Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🌵Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2744010/Urban_Jungle/?utm_source=YT&utm_campaign=Date
Shop: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/AssembleEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/assemble-entertainment
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/assembleteam
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/assembleteam
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/assembleteam/
Newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/assembleteam/assemble-newsletter
Website: http://www.assembleteam.com/

▬  About Urban Jungle  ▬▬▬▬▬
Experience the joy of running your own cozy small business: Create stickers, pack orders and hear your customers’ stories. Time to build the cutest shop on the internet! 
#cozygaming #cozygames  #wholesomegames  

Twitter: https://twitter.com/kylyk_games

▬ Assemble Entertainment ▬▬▬▬▬▬
Based in Wiesbaden, Germany, Assemble Entertainment is an independent, privately owned games publisher that’s made “Saving the World. Game by Game.” it’s mission. Founded by Stefan Marcinek in 2016, Assemble is known for its critically acclaimed and diverse indie games such as Endzone – A World Apart, Roadwarden, Lacuna, and Orbital Bullet. Since 2022 Assemble is responsible for the distribution of Mixtvisions games, handling indie hits such as FAR: Lone Sails. Assemble also has won the German Developer Award twice in the category “Best Publisher.” Learn more about Assemble at www.assembleteam.com. 

Assemble organizes GermanDevDays, one of the most popular German-speaking conferences held in Frankfurt. The conference, hosted by Stefan Marcinek, features the GermanDevDays Indie Award, where indie teams across Germany can participate to win cash prizes. Learn more about the GermanDevDays www.germandevdays.com. @AssembleTeam #AssembleEntertainment

▬ More Links ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Livestream: https://www.twitch.tv/assembleentertainment
Assemble Discord: https://discord.com/invite/assemble-entertainment
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/assemble-entertainment/
Endzone Discord: https://discord.com/invite/worldofendzone
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AssembleEntertainment/

▬ More Games  ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Endzone - A World Apart: https://youtu.be/O7eLGc0judo?list=PLEM2iueadJ3Ihy-ItrWqQH72FpcNQjGdw
Leisure Suit Larry – Wet Dreams Don’t Dry: https://youtu.be/c-6WyjEJFVk?list=PLEM2iueadJ3KRexrNB03Ocpz-cGNeHVaB
Lacuna: https://youtu.be/sWh4Fzv7vLE?list=PLEM2iueadJ3Klskv1WdlD2uew01TMX6KB
Orbital Bullet: https://youtu.be/hS5TBMEHYlQ?list=PLEM2iueadJ3KoD1PoEF2hSDp5-NvGLhyC
ITORAH: https://youtu.be/CPJvHciJpwY?list=PLEM2iueadJ3J51klutPCVfYV1QjcE8-xE
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
